bib.title: A strategy of mapping Polish Wordnet onto Princeton Wordnet
bib.author: Rudnicka, Ewa and Maziarz, Marek and Piasecki, Maciej and Szpakowicz, Stan
bib.abstract: We present a strategy and the early results of the mapping of plWordNet–one of the largest such language resources in existence–onto Princeton WordNet. The fundamental structural premise of plWordNet differs from those of most other wordnets: lexical units rather than synsets are the basic building blocks. The addition of new material to plWordNet is consistently informed by semantic relations and by various analyses of large corpora. The mapping is difficult because of the subtly distinct structures and because of WordNet's focus
